response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and worth to both of us, valued at $1,000,000. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your keen interest and appreciation for the product's value. Please let me know if this proposition aligns with your expectations and budget.", "product_price": 950000}
